entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is revealed to be carried up to Dumbledore's office on a spiral stone staircase.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. His voice is heard from behind the door, inviting Harry to enter his office.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He has arranged with Dumbledore for Harry's detention to be rescheduled.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The book series in which the story is set. It is mentioned at the beginning of the text as '186 H ARRY  POTTER'.

relationships.description: Harry visits Dumbledore's office, where he has a conversation with him about his detention.
Harry is detained by Professor Snape, but the detention is rescheduled to next Saturday at the request of Dumbledore.
